content.query:
let Logs = MicrosoftPurviewInformationProtection 
| extend common = parse_json(Common)
| extend protection = parse_json(ProtectionEventData)
| extend sit = parse_json(SensitiveInfoTypeData) 
| extend MachineName_s = common.DeviceName, ObjectId_s = columnifexists("ObjectId",""), Activity_s = columnifexists("Operation",""), LabelId_g = columnifexists("SensitivityLabelId",""), Protected_b = protection.IsProtected;
let minTime = toscalar(Logs | where isnotempty(MachineName_s) | summarize min(TimeGenerated));
let dates = range ["date"] from bin(minTime, {TimeRange:grain}) to now() step {TimeRange:grain};
Logs
| where isnotempty(MachineName_s)
| summarize labels=countif(isnotempty(ObjectId_s) and Activity_s in ("SensitivityLabelApplied", "SensitivityLabelUpdated", "SensitivityLabelRemoved", "SensitivityLabelPolicyMatched", "SensitivityLabeledFileOpened") and isnotempty(LabelId_g)),
protected=countif(isnotempty(ObjectId_s) and Activity_s in ("SensitivityLabelApplied", "SensitivityLabelUpdated", "SensitivityLabelRemoved") and Protected_b) by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
| join kind= rightouter (
    dates
)
on $left.TimeGenerated == $right.["date"]
| project ["date"], Labels = coalesce(labels, 0), ["Protected Labels"] = coalesce(protected, 0)
content.title: MPIP Connector

content.query:
let Logs = MicrosoftPurviewInformationProtection 
| extend common = parse_json(Common)
| extend protection = parse_json(ProtectionEventData)
| extend sit = parse_json(SensitiveInfoTypeData) 
| extend MachineName_s = tostring(common.DeviceName), UserId_s = columnifexists("UserId","");
let minTime = toscalar(Logs | where isnotempty(MachineName_s) | summarize min(TimeGenerated));
let dates = range ["date"] from bin(minTime, {TimeRange:grain}) to now() step {TimeRange:grain};
Logs
| where isnotempty(MachineName_s)
| summarize users=dcount(UserId), devices = dcount(MachineName_s) by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
| join kind= rightouter
(
    dates
)
on $left.TimeGenerated == $right.["date"]
| project ["date"], users = coalesce(users, 0), devices = coalesce(devices, 0)
content.title: MPIP Connector

content.query:
let Logs = MicrosoftPurviewInformationProtection 
| join kind=leftouter Labels_CL on $left.SensitivityLabelId==$right.Guid_gÂ 
| extend common = parse_json(Common)
| extend protection = parse_json(ProtectionEventData)
| extend sit = parse_json(SensitiveInfoTypeData) 
| extend LabelName_s = columnifexists("DisplayName_s",""), LabelId_g = columnifexists("SensitivityLabelId",""), ObjectId_s = columnifexists("ObjectId",""), Activity_s = columnifexists("Operation","");
Logs
| where isnotempty(LabelId_g)
| where isnotempty(ObjectId_s)
| where Activity_s in ("SensitivityLabelApplied", "SensitivityLabelUpdated", "SensitivityLabelRemoved")
| summarize value=count() by LabelName_s
| order by value
content.title: MPIP Connector with Labels

content.query:
let Logs = MicrosoftPurviewInformationProtection 
| extend common = parse_json(Common)
| extend protection = parse_json(ProtectionEventData)
| extend sit = parse_json(SensitiveInfoTypeData) 
| extend ApplicationName_s = tostring(common.ApplicationName), LabelId_g = columnifexists("SensitivityLabelId",""), ObjectId_s = columnifexists("ObjectId",""), Activity_s = columnifexists("Operation","");
Logs
| where isnotempty(LabelId_g)
| where isnotempty(ObjectId_s)
| where Activity_s in ("SensitivityLabelApplied", "SensitivityLabelUpdated", "SensitivityLabelRemoved")
| summarize value=count() by ApplicationName_s
| order by value
content.title: MPIP Connector
